comment:
{
    "VARIABLES": "Let x be the number of units of wine and y be the number of units of kombucha.",
    "CONSTRAINTS": [
        "3x + 5y \leq \text{Total units of fruit available}",
        "8x + 7y \leq 7000 \text{ (Total units of water constraint)}",
        "7y \leq 9000 \text{ (Total units of tea constraint)}",
        "x \geq y \text{ (Wine must be larger than kombucha)}",
        "y \geq 0.2(x+y) \text{ (At least 20% of products must be kombucha)}"
    ],
    "OBJECTIVE": "Minimize 3x + 5y (Total units of fruit required)"
}
